title: Vue UI Enhancements & State Management
description: Implemented interactive Vue components including sliders and drawer-based views. Managed reactive state, user-driven events, and form workflows while maintaining performance and UI consistency.

title: Vue 2 to Vue 3 Migration Task
description: Migrated existing Vue 2 modules to Vue 3, refactoring Options API logic into Composition API for improved readability, reusability, and maintainability.

title: Micro-Frontend SPA Integration
description: Embedded Vue SPA modules into a Single SPA architecture to support micro-frontend adoption, enabling independent deployment and better frontend scalability.

title: Backend Architecture Migration Task
description: Refactored backend components from N-tier architecture to Clean Architecture, applying Domain-Driven Design principles and implementing patterns such as Factory, Mediator, and Facade.

title: API Performance & Caching Optimization
description: Improved API performance by implementing distributed caching with Redis, optimizing MongoDB queries with indexing, and handling request cancellation using cancellation tokens.

title: Security & Code Quality Improvements
description: Resolved SonarQube code quality issues and remediated Aqua security scan vulnerabilities by applying secure coding practices and clean code standards.

title: External Service & Angular SPA Contribution
description: Integrated external services such as Google Maps API into Vue applications and contributed to Angular SPA development for a limited number of Agile sprints.
